entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
